short_description: corfee stone is an employment attorney based in sacramento, california, united states.
long_description: corfee stone law corporation provides advice and legal services to owners and operators of businesses (landlords and tenants) to comply with the american's with disabilities act (ada) and california's similar law. corfee stone represents and defends landlords, tenants, homeowners associations, senior living facilities, time shares, condominiums, etc., regarding housing issues involving disability discrimination and failure to provide reasonable accommodations.
generated_description: corfee stone law, legally known as corfee stone law corporation, is a legal services firm based in clio, california. the company provides advice and legal services to business owners and operators, landlords, and tenants. their areas of expertise include ada access compliance, employment law, fair housing law, and landlord-tenant law. corfee stone law corporation is recognized for defending employers in litigation related to wrongful termination, discrimination, harassment, and wage and hour disputes. they also represent and defend various entities, including homeowners associations, senior living facilities, and condominiums, in housing issues involving disability discrimination and failure to provide reasonable accommodations. the firm is led by catherine m. corfee, esq., who has extensive experience in employment law, ada access, fair housing litigation, and constitutional law.
